name: Death March
description:
A project demo of Death March.

A game based around avoiding enemies where their bloodlust for you gives you power to defeat the bosses who sealed away your power.

If you get the time please fill out a feedback forum to tell the developers what you thought! - https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd3g-17vbhAuP68hVm6Wv8pjbF8haislavbSnxiEiItt_kZuQ/viewform

If you're interested in the music:

"Breakdown", "Danse Macabre - Busy Strings", "Grim Idol"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
